name: Maid of Chapelle Bleue
description:
New maid Eloise is excited to escape her tiny hamlet to take care of the reclusive Lord Fox's estate, Chapelle Bleue. The castle is situated in the outskirts of town within a sprawling forest. 

And there are rumors.

  • 3 Endings
  • ~25-30 min read time
  • Maybe  ghost?

------------------

Ver. 1.1 -Updated some coding errors with endings, minor spelling/grammar fixes

Created for NaNoRenO 21. My first game and mostly me just trying to figure renpy and how to do branching paths out.
